issue.title: [Packaging][Crossbow] Duplicated key in nightly test configuration
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5421](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5421). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
"docker-python-3.6-alpine" key is duplicated in dev/tasks/tests.yml

comments.body:
